name: Hiring Manager
description: Dataiku is a centralized data platform that helps businesses design, deploy, and manage AI and analytics applications. It provides a collaborative environment for a wide range of users, from data scientists to business analysts, to systemize the use of data for better business results.

name: Hiring Manager
description: Hugging Face is a community and platform focused on advancing artificial intelligence through open-source collaboration. It is best known for its Transformers library and for hosting a vast repository of pre-trained models and datasets, enabling developers to build and deploy state-of-the-art machine learning models.
